column2: The CI service automatically tests new branches
column3: CI job templates exist for each type of software project (  Java app servers Node.js app etc.)
column4: All projects use a CI service
column5: CI jobs verify complaince of projects
column7: CI confirms that versions are unique
column8: CI jobs use monitoring to assess each change's effect on
column10: CI makes the quality of the code base highly visible
column11: CI jobs execute functional tests against projects
column14: Developers use  development tools (DK Vagrant etc)
column15: All infrastructure and deployment code is stored in VCS
column16: Developers provision their own isolated VMs as needed
column17: Developers use VM images that closely resemble production systems
column18: Code documentation is easy to write and is viewable by all with VCS access
column19: Developers use Testing Software to verify that work as intended
